meta.title: Krown DAC Memberclient
meta.keywords: krowndac, member, krown, eos, dac, token, custodian, blockchain, crypto, decentralized, autonomous
meta.noscript: To view this webpage you need to have javascript enabled

index.description_p1: Krown DAC is a decentralized autonomous community which means it is owned and operated by the token holders who agree to the constitution and register as members of the community.
index.description_p2: When completed, this member client will allow you to read the constitution, register as a member, submit worker proposals, register as a custodian candidate, vote on custodians, transfer tokens, and more. If you have any questions, please reach out to us using the links below.
index.discord_description: Krown DAC exists as an active, engaged community building tools to enable other DACs. Telegram is where we bring our skills together and coordinate our activites.
index.website_description: Everything you'd like to know about Krown DAC can be found on our website at krown.club.
index.welcome_to_esodac_member_client: Welcome to the Krown DAC Member Client

verify_token.copied_to_clipboard: Copied the token to your clipboard!
verify_token.description: You've been redirected to this page to pair an eos account with a discord id. Please sign the message and go back to the discord bot. Run the command $verify.
verify_token.title: Verify token
